lines.text: "Let's not talk; let's go down there and watch one of these fellows try to defend themselves".

[summarizing his argument before the Supreme Court]
I think Betts vs. Brady was wrong when it was decided. I think time has made that clear. And I think that the time has come that the correct rule, the civilized rule, the rule of individualism, the rule of due process must be stated by this Court.

[referring to Jacob, who is about to argue before the Supreme Court for the very first time]
Don't go feeling sorry for the poor son-of-a-bitch until we've won.
